labPackage

Class ShooterMilestone

  • java.lang.Object
    • labPackage.ShooterMilestone

  • public class ShooterMilestone
extends java.lang.Object
    ball loading, holding and shooting mechanism uses an arm, claw, color sensor, ballista motor and holder motor
    Author:
    Mike

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShooterMilestone(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor lowerArmMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor higherArmMotor, RegulatedMotor shooter, RegulatedMotor loaderMotor, Navigation nav, Odometer odo, SampleProvider colorValue, float[] colorData, EV3ColorSensor colorSensor, double angle)
      constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getFilteredBValue()
      takes 5 blue color samples and returns the lowest value value is a float between 0.0 and 10.0
      float getFilteredRValue()
      takes 5 red color samples and returns the lowest value value is a float between 0.0 and 10.0
      boolean isBlueBall()
      returns whether or not the sensed ball is blue

      checks if the sensed ball is the desired color
      boolean isRedBall()
      returns whether or not the sensed ball is red

      • ShooterMilestone

                        Navigation nav,

                        SampleProvider colorValue,
                        float[] colorData,
                        EV3ColorSensor colorSensor,
                        double angle)
        constructor. set local variables to passed parameters
        Parameters:
        lowerArmMotor - for arm movement
        higherArmMotor - for claw movement
        shooter - for winding and shooting
        loaderMotor - for shifting balls in holding mechanism
        nav - access to robot navigation
        odo - access to position information
        colorValue - for sensor values
        colorData -
        colorSensor -
        angle -

    • Method Detail

      • loadBalls

        public void loadBalls(int targetBallColor)
        Load balls of color targetBallColor into shooter and holder
        Parameters:
        targetBallColor - integer of ball to pick up. 0 for red, 1 for blue, 2 for either

      • shootAll

        public void shootAll()
        shoots all 4 balls one at a time. loading time is roughly 6 seconds

      • isDesiredBall

        public boolean isDesiredBall(int clr)
        checks if the sensed ball is the desired color
        Parameters:
        clr - the desired color. 0 for red, 1 for blue, 2 for either
        Returns:
        true if the ball is desirable

      • isRedBall

        public boolean isRedBall()
        returns whether or not the sensed ball is red
        Returns:
        true if the ball is red

      • isBlueBall

        public boolean isBlueBall()
        returns whether or not the sensed ball is blue
        Returns:
        true if the ball is blue

      • getFilteredRValue

        public float getFilteredRValue()
        takes 5 red color samples and returns the lowest value value is a float between 0.0 and 10.0
        Returns:
        the lowest of 5 consecutive red color readings

      • getFilteredBValue

        public float getFilteredBValue()
        takes 5 blue color samples and returns the lowest value value is a float between 0.0 and 10.0
        Returns:
        the lowest of 5 consecutive blue color readings
